title: Sonos reportedly launching its own voice assistant, because the world doesn’t have enough of them
content:
If you find yourself looking at Alexa, Google Assistant, Siri (Bixby?) and decide another voice assistant is needed, good news! Sonos, famed for its connected audio systems, is coming to the rescue you didn’t know you needed. Or so a new report from The Verge claims, with Sonos preparing to ship Sonos Voice on June 1

The post Sonos reportedly launching its own voice assistant, because the world doesn’t have enough of them appeared first on XDA.
description: Does the world really need another voice assistant? A new report says that Sonos Voice is coming really soon. As long as it's not another Cortana.
